<jasperReport name="UserLinksReport" columnCount="1" printOrder="Vertical" orientation="Portrait" pageWidth="595" pageHeight="842" columnWidth="575" columnSpacing="0" leftMargin="0" rightMargin="20" topMargin="0" bottomMargin="0" whenNoDataType="NoPages" isTitleNewPage="false" isSummaryNewPage="false"> <property name="ireport.scriptlethandling" value="0" /> <property name="ireport.encoding" value="UTF-8" /> <import value="java.util.*" /> <import value="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.*" /> <import value="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.data.*" />
<style name="SailPointBlueBackWhiteFront" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#FFFFFF" backcolor="#025588" vAlign="Middle" leftPadding="5" isStyledText="false" fontName="Arial" fontSize="12" isBold="true"
isBlankWhenNull="true" /> <style name="Heading" isDefault="false" mode="Opaque" forecolor="#000000" backcolor="#CCDEE7" fontName="Arial" fontSize="14" isBold="true" isBlankWhenNull="true" />
<parameter name="id" isForPrompting="false" class="java.lang.String"/> <parameter name="SUBREPORT1" isForPrompting="false" class="net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JasperReport"> <parameterDescription><![CDATA[UserAttributeReport]]></parameterDescription> </parameter> <queryString><![CDATA[select l.*, a.name as appName from spt_link l, spt_application a where l.identity_id = $P{id} AND a.id = l.application order by appName]]></queryString>
<field name="id" class="java.lang.String"/> <field name="created" class="java.lang.Long"/> <field name="modified" class="java.lang.Long"/> <field name="native_identity" class="java.lang.String"/> <field name="last_refresh" class="java.lang.Long"/> <field name="identityId" class="java.lang.String"/> <field name="application" class="java.lang.String"/> <field name="attributes" class="java.lang.String"/> <field name="idx" class="java.lang.Integer"/> <field name="appName" class="java.lang.String"/>
